items.title: [0.0.3] Add volume control for sample
[0.0.3] Add loop on/off button
[0.0.2] Too long sample names get outta screen
Built-in file dialog can display only english
items.body:
Built in file dialog introduced in 0.0.2 can't display languages other than English
See picture

https://ibb.co/whYdGsq

items.title: [0.0.2] Render sample waveform
[0.0.2] Add ability to stop sample playback and resume it
[0.0.2] Add some background to GUI with Sampler name
[0.0.2] Be able to use loaded samples
items.body: Samples must be mapped to midi-keyboard and be played with pich changing according to note being played.

items.title: 0.0.1 version release
[0.0.1] Cannot open FileChooser in Ardour
[0.0.1] In Ardour there is some black stripe to the right of plugin gui
items.body: Maybe Ardour requires some minimum size, bigger than current one.

items.title: [0.0.1] VST doesn't load in Ardour under Linux
[0.0.1] Some JUCE leaks when close app while playing sample
[0.0.1] Build and test VST plugin for Linux
[0.0.1] FileChooser mask works not right on Linux
items.body: For some reason, in FileChooser there is no way to filter all supported audio extensions at the same time.

items.title: Complainings about "bad" fonts in application

items.body: Sound file played with artifacts. Maybe its has something to do with samplerate.
